page.title: 03FARMING IN STAMBOURNE 2
page.content: {VARIETIES OF CROPS GROWN} WHEAT: Norman, Galahad, Longbow, Fenman, Hobbit, Avalon. BARLEY: Maris Otter,Halcyon,(malting), Igri, Panda, Sonya,(feed). OILSEED RAPE: Bienvue. SUGAR BEET: Monoire, Regina. {CROP ROTATION} Traditional rotation almost extinct; wheat can be grown after wheat and barley after barley. Change of crop needed after Oilseed Rape,Peas and Beans. These crops are grown on large farms as a rotation. {SOME AVERAGE PRICES } FERTILISER: Â£146.50 per tonne. SPRAY: Â£12.00 per acre. SEED CORN: Â£215 per tonne. BARLEY: Â£90 per tonne paid by dealer. WHEAT: Â£100 per tonne paid by dealer. { EXPECTED YIELDS (tonnes per acre)} BARLEY: 2.5 WHEAT: 2.75
